derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (as an adjective): from Latin cerealis, from Ceres,.the name of the Roman goddess of agriculture

entry.tran: (拌以牛奶作早餐的)谷类食品，麦片
entry.def: Cereal or breakfast cereal is a food made from grain. It is mixed with milk and eaten for breakfast.

example.ex: I have a bowl of cereal every morning.
example.tran: 我每天早上喝一碗麦片。

entry.def: Cereals are plants such as wheat, corn, or rice that produce grain.

example.ex: ...the rich cereal-growing districts of the Paris Basin.
example.tran: 巴黎盆地盛产谷物的地区

means.word_mean: 1. grass whose starchy grains are used as food: wheat; rice; rye; oats; maize; buckwheat; millet
2. foodstuff prepared from the starchy grains of cereal grasses
3. a breakfast food prepared from grain
1. made of grain or relating to grain or the plants that produce it;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词"人,物,状态"; 2. 地方; 3. 表形容词,"……的"
